actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A  bill to amend the Public Health Services Act to provide for the establishment of a coordinated program to improve preschool oral health.
short_title: Early Childhood Oral Health Improvement Act
subjects: Federal aid to child health services

summary.text: Early Childhood Oral Health Improvement Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish a program to assist innovative oral health activities to improve the oral health of children under six years of age who are eligible for services under a Federal health program. Provides for program grants or contracts to dental training institutions, community dental programs, and Indian health programs. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Early Childhood Oral Health Improvement Act
A  bill to amend the Public Health Services Act to provide for the establishment of a coordinated program to improve preschool oral health.
